statements: SELECT * FROM FoodSouvenirs
SELECT item_name, price FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE stock_quantity > 0
SELECT description FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM FoodSouvenirs ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, item_name, description FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE stock_quantity >= 10
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC, item_name DESC
SELECT * FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name
SELECT id, description FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE stock_quantity > 10 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE item_name LIKE 'Choco%'
SELECT id, item_name, description, price FROM FoodSouvenirs WHERE description IS NOT NULL
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Pricing WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT item_name, price*quantity AS total_price FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, price, discount FROM Pricing ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND location='Warehouse A'
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM Inventory JOIN Pricing ON Inventory.item_id=Pricing.item_id WHERE Pricing.discount > 0.1 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, price*discount AS discounted_price FROM Inventory JOIN Pricing ON Inventory.item_id=Pricing.item_id WHERE Pricing.discount > 0 ORDER BY discounted_price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM shops WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.item_id = sales.item_id WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT shop_name, owner_name, location FROM shops ORDER BY shop_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT shop_name, location, owner_name FROM shops WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, quantity, total_price FROM inventory INNER JOIN sales ON inventory.item_id = sales.item_id WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT shop_name, location, item_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN shops ON inventory.shop_id = shops.shop_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold >= 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT shop_name, location FROM shops ORDER BY shop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold >= 10 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT employee_name, shop_id FROM employees WHERE shop_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT shop_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM shops INNER JOIN sales ON shops.shop_id = sales.shop_id GROUP BY shop_name, location;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory INNER JOIN sales ON inventory.item_id = sales.item_id WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY shop_id, employee_name;
SELECT * FROM souvenirs;
SELECT name, price FROM souvenirs WHERE category='Mugs';
SELECT * FROM shops ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT shop_id, name, location FROM shops WHERE location='Tokyo';
SELECT sale_date, shop_id, souvenir_id FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM souvenirs WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, category, price FROM souvenirs WHERE category='Food' ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT s.name AS souvenir_name, sh.name AS shop_name, i.quantity FROM souvenirs s JOIN inventory i ON s.souvenir_id = i.souvenir_id JOIN shops sh ON i.shop_id = sh.shop_id WHERE i.quantity > 0 ORDER BY sh.name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT s.category FROM souvenirs s LEFT JOIN inventory i ON s.souvenir_id = i.souvenir_id WHERE i.quantity IS NULL
SELECT sh.name AS shop_name, COUNT(s.sale_id) AS total_sales FROM shops sh LEFT JOIN sales s ON sh.shop_id = s.shop_id GROUP BY sh.name HAVING total_sales > 10 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
